item.description:
I'm proud to announce we have collected enough in dues to pay for meetup.com until August.  So THANKS everybody!  Aaron has created an accounting of the treasury that we will share with you all soon and if we have a surplus, we can discuss ideas for how to use the funds.

For now, we will be raffling off a $30 gift certificate to The Yarn Seller at this meetup!  It's a lovely shop in York, ME.  All those who've paid dues for February are entered, and you DO NOT have to be present to win.  You can check your meetup profile page for your payment status.  Please contact Aaron right away if your profile does not reflect a payment so we can make sure to put your name in the raffle!
item.name: Knit night Wednesday - Raffle Night!
